question: Q. What is the InvestNow Investment Security Guarantee?

data.main: Our InvestNow Investment Security Guarantee ensures complete coverage, addressing 100% of any losses in your InvestNow Investment accounts resulting from unauthorized activity. For detailed information, please visit InvestNow.com

question: Q. How much does it cost to work with InvestNow Investment?

data.main: Benefit from $0 online listed stock, option, and ETF trade commissions1,2. Explore thousands of non-load, no-transaction-fee mutual funds3. Collaborate with an InvestNow Investment Financial Consultant at no charge (note: additional account fees, fund expenses, and brokerage commissions may apply). Check our comprehensive pricing details for a full overview.
points: Standard online $0 commission does not apply to over-the-counter (OTC) equities, transaction-fee mutual funds, futures, fixed-income investments, or trades placed directly on a foreign exchange or in the Canadian market. Options trades will be subject to the standard $0.65 per-contract fee. Service charges apply for trades placed through a broker ($25) or by automated phone ($5). Exchange process, ADR, and Stock Borrow fees still apply. See the InvestNow InvestNow Investment Pricing Guide for Individual Investors for full fee and commission schedules.

ETFs at InvestNow Investment & Co., Inc. ('InvestNow Investment') which are U.S. exchange-listed can be traded without a commission on buy and sell transactions made online in a InvestNow Investment account. Unlisted ETFs are subject to a commission. Please see pricing guide for additional information. InvestNow Investment does not receive payment to promote any particular ETF to its customers. InvestNow Investment's affiliate InvestNow InvestNow Investment Investment Management, Inc. ('CSIM') serves as investment advisor to the InvestNow Investment ETFs, which compensate CSIM out of the applicable operating expense ratios. The amount of the fees is disclosed in the prospectus of each ETF.

Trades in no load funds available through InvestNow Investment's Mutual Fund OneSource® service (including InvestNow Investment Funds), as well as certain other funds, are available without transaction fees when placed through InvestNow Investment.com or our automated phone channels. For each of these trade orders placed through a broker, a $25 service charge applies. InvestNow Investment's short-term redemption fee of $49.95 will be charged on redemption of funds purchased through Mutual Fund OneSource® service and held for 90 days or less. InvestNow Investment reserves the right to change the funds we make available without transaction fees and to reinstate fees on any funds. InvestNow InvestNow Investment & Co., Inc. receives remuneration from fund companies participating in the Mutual Fund OneSource service for recordkeeping and shareholder services and other administrative services. InvestNow Investment also may receive remuneration from transaction fee fund companies for certain administrative services.

question: Q. How do I open an account?

data.main: Opening an account is simple and can be done online, by phone, or in one of over 300 branches. Click here to open an account online in about 10 minutes.

question: Q. What kind of investment products does InvestNow Investment offer?

data.main: InvestNow Investment provides a diverse range of investment products to assist you in building a well-rounded portfolio and achieving your goals.

question: Q. How easy is it to switch brokerage providers?

data.main: Transferring your existing account to a new brokerage firm may seem complex, but InvestNow Investment simplifies the process:
points: Utilize our online account transfer tool to initiate and monitor the process.
View and access your assets in your InvestNow Investment account.

data.main: Need assistance? Our account transfer specialists are available to guide you at +1 (888) 891-6039.

question: Q. Why should I bank with InvestNow Investment Bank?

data.main: Here's why we believe you should choose InvestNow Investment Bank:
points: Receive unlimited ATM fee rebates4 with no foreign transaction fees5 and no account minimums. Bank anytime, anywhere with InvestNow Investment Mobile6. The InvestNow Investment Bank High Yield Investor Checking®7 account is linked to a InvestNow Investment One® brokerage account, allowing you to manage both accounts with a single login.

Enjoy no monthly account service fees, earn interest on your balance, and benefit from FDIC insurance8 up to $250,000. Upon funding your account with at least $100, receive free standard checks, activate InvestNow Investment Bank Bill Pay™, and receive a Visa® Platinum Debit Card upon account opening.

data.main: Open an InvestNow Investment Bank High Yield Investor Checking account or learn more.
